tool_description: Claris Connect連携用のサービスです。地図表示を行うために利用します。
name: For Claris map
title: For Claris map

api_list.name: ping
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://for-claris-map.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "for-claris-map.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://for-claris-map.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "for-claris-map.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
